DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this clinical study is to learn if there are any changes in how blood gets to your heart muscle and if your heart size changed after your heart attack.
DOC.brief_title: CARDIOLITE-413: A Study for Patients Who Had a PCI for an Acute MI
DOC.criteria: Undergoing primary or rescue PCI for acute MI with ECG evidence of a large territory at risk. History of prior MI or CABG surgery, persistent LBBB, Atrial Fibrillation, End stage renal disease, Weight > 350 lbs.
